attributes.action: Sensor lights on the roads  in the new forest To prevent ponies being killed
attributes.additional_details: Because the new forest is part of our British heritage these ponies give us all amazing pleasure when you drive through but careless speeding drivers with NO thought consideration or care put these poor animals at risk especially at night sensor lights on the roads in hotspots have got to be put down to prevent another upsetting news story like last night please
attributes.background:
Please funding to put sensor lights on hotspots in the new forest to save these ponies being killed 
New Year’s Eve not 1 but 4 ponies killed in one hit by 1 car this has got to stop

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. 

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
